title: Ep 458 | Jase's Theory of the Lifted Curse & Phil Calls Jase Smart
description:
Phil and Jase dive into scripture concerning the inheritance of a new body or a new Earth. Jase reveals why he thinks the curse on the earth mentioned in the book of Genesis may have been lifted after the flood. Phil and Jase say that Al should be buried in Tibetan style, and Al describes out-of-body experiences. Phil points out that Vikings shouldn't be wasting perfectly good boats when they perform their funeral rituals, and Al explains why Jesus left the planet after his resurrection.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://blazetv.com/unashamed
